name: BoxCat
description: Box cat is the most cute in the world! An action platformer game using various boxes, Box Cat! Box Cat is an adventure story in a strange world where everything is boxed. Find out the Goal Box to avoid monsters and obstacles by wearing various boxes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista or Later Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
